name: cbk-functional-library
description: This library includes functional helpers for object, string, and array processing.

scripts.push-and-publish: git push --follow-tags origin main && npm publish
scripts.git-add-and-commit: git add . && git commit -m 'fix: create build'
scripts.release: npm run wipe-and-build && standard-version && npm run push-and-publish
scripts.major-release: npm run wipe-and-build && standard-version --release-as major && npm run push-and-publish

author: Carsten Koch
